fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check someone for evidence of crimes each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will find evidence of murder if your target has killed someone at some point in the game.
- You will find evidence of trespassing if your target has visited a member of an opposing faction at any point in the game.
- Framed targets will appear to have evidence of both crimes.
- Disguised targets will appear to have evidence of no crimes.
